<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Check AWS S3 Flow Log status</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/cloud-accounts-manager/v1/cloud-accounts/aws/{accountId}/features/aws-flow-logs/s3/status"}></MethodEndpoint>



Checks AWS S3 Flow Log status of monitored account.

## Request
